name: ASSOCIATION FOR VOLUNTARY ACTION
briefDescription: Association for Voluntary Action is the legal entity managing the core activities of Bachpan Bachao Andolan (BBA), a pioneering grassroots initiative since 1980, to create an empowered child friendly society, where children are protected, treated with dignity and receive free and quality education. It implements activities towards this end by assisting child exploitation victims, forming Child Friendly Villages (CFVs), instigating legal and judicial interventions for protection and rehabilitation of children, national and global awareness campaigns, partnership building, etc. Since its inception, AVAâ€™s work has led to the rescue of over 82,800 trafficking victims and ensured access to education for over 200,000 children.
